job.title: Data Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: We at Vatica Health are looking for a passionate Data Engineer and Analyst to turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions. You will conduct full life-cycle activities to include requirements analysis and design, develop analysis and reporting capabilities, and continuously monitor performance and quality control plans to identify improvements.<br><br><strong><u>Essential Duties And Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Develop and implement data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and data quality</li> <li>Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports</li> <li>Acquire data from primary and secondary data sources </li> <li>Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets </li> <li>Filter and “clean” data, and review trends of bad data to identify problems </li> <li>Work closely with management to prioritize business and information needs </li> <li>Locate and define new process improvement opportunities </li> <li>Document and maintain documentation around data handling activities and customer </li> <br><br></ul><strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul> <li>BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field</li> <li>Proven working experience as a Data &amp; Reporting Analyst </li> <li>Technical expertise regarding data models, database design development, data mining and reporting techniques </li> <li>Strong knowledge of and experience with Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services, SQL Server Reporting Services, T-SQL, Microsoft Excel, and Microsoft Powerpoint </li> <li>Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy </li> <li>Adept at writing T-SQL queries, report writing and presenting findings </li> <li>Risk adjustment and/or Quality experience is a plus </li> <li>Healthcare Industry experience is preferred </li> <br><br></ul><u><strong>Benefits<br><br></strong></u>WORKING AT VATICA HEALTH ADVANTAGES<br><br>Prosperity<br><ul> <li>Competitive salary based on your experience and skills – we believe the top talent deserves the top dollar</li> <li>Bonus Potential (based on role and is discretionary) – if you go above and beyond, you should be rewarded</li> <li>401k plans– we want to empower you to prepare for your future</li> <li>Room for growth and advancement- we love our employees and want to develop within</li> <br></ul>Good Health<br><ul> <li>Comprehensive Medical, Dental, and Vision insurance plans</li> <li>Tax-free Dependent Care Account</li> <li>Life insurance, short-term, and long-term disability</li> <br></ul>Happiness<br><ul> <li>Excellent PTO policy (everyone deserves a vacation now and then)</li> <li>Great work-life balance environment- We believe family comes first!</li> <li>Strong supportive teams- There is always a helping hand when you need it</li> <br></ul>Are you up to the challenge? What are you waiting for? Apply today!
